member.summary: Replaces the current node with the nodes.

member.name: P:AngleSharp.DOM.CharacterData.NextElementSibling
member.summary: Gets the element immediately following in this node's parent's list of nodes, or null if the current element is the last element in that list.

member.summary: Creates a new style sheet.

member.summary: Gets the style sheet language for this style sheet.

member.name: P:AngleSharp.DOM.StyleSheet.IsDisabled
member.summary: Gets or sets if the stylesheet is applied to the document. Modifying this attribute may cause a new resolution of style for the document. If the media doesn't apply to the current user agent, the disabled attribute is ignored.

member.name: P:AngleSharp.DOM.StyleSheet.OwnerNode
member.summary: Gets the element that associates this style sheet with the document.

member.name: P:AngleSharp.DOM.StyleSheet.Parent
member.summary: Gets the parent stylesheet for style sheet languages that support the concept of style sheet inclusion.

member.name: P:AngleSharp.DOM.StyleSheet.Href
member.summary: Gets the value of the attribute, which is its location. For inline style sheets, the value of this attribute is null.

member.name: P:AngleSharp.DOM.StyleSheet.Title
member.summary: Gets the advisory title. The title is often specified in the ownerNode.

member.name: P:AngleSharp.DOM.StyleSheet.Media
member.summary: Gets the intended destination media for style information. The media is often specified in the ownerNode. If no media has been specified, the MediaList is empty.

member.returns: The string with the symbol or null.

member.name: M:AngleSharp.Html.Entities.GetEntity(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the entity name specified by its symbol (may be ambiguous).
member.returns: The string with the entity name or null.

member.summary: Converts a given number into its unicode character.
member.returns: The array containing the character.

member.returns: The suggested encoding.

member.name: M:AngleSharp.DocumentEncoding.GetEncoding(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the encoding for lesser used charsets. This might result in an exception depending on the platform (mostly Windows Phone *). Exceptions are handled by returning UTF8. That should work well in most scenarios.
member.returns: The encoding for the given charset.

member.summary: Gets or sets the autocomplete HTML attribute, indicating whether the value of the control can be automatically completed by the browser. Ignored if the value of the type attribute is hidden, checkbox, radio, file, or a button type (button, submit, reset, image).

member.summary: Gets a list of selected files.

member.name: P:AngleSharp.DOM.Html.HTMLInputElement.List
member.summary: Gets the datalist element in the same document. Only options that are valid values for this input element will be displayed. This attribute is ignored when the type attribute's value is hidden, checkbox, radio, file, or a button type.

member.name: P:AngleSharp.DOM.Html.HTMLInputElement.Maximum
member.summary: Gets or sets max HTML attribute, containing the maximum (numeric or date-time) value for this item, which must not be less than its minimum (min attribute) value.

member.name: P:AngleSharp.DOM.Html.HTMLInputElement.Minimum
member.summary: Gets or sets the min HTML attribute, containing the minimum (numeric or date-time) value for this item, which must not be greater than its maximum (max attribute) value.

member.name: P:AngleSharp.DOM.Html.HTMLInputElement.Pattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the pattern HTML attribute, containing a regular expression that the control's value is checked against. The pattern must match the entire value, not just some subset. This attribute applies when the value of the type attribute is text, search, tel, url or email; otherwise it is ignored.

member.name: P:AngleSharp.DOM.Html.HTMLInputElement.Size
member.summary: Gets or sets the size HTML attribute, containing size of the control. This value is in pixels unless the value of type is text or password, in which case, it is an integer number of characters. Applies only when type is set to text, search, tel, url, email, or password; otherwise it is ignored.

member.name: P:AngleSharp.DOM.Html.HTMLInputElement.Source
P:AngleSharp.DOM.Html.HTMLInputElement.Step
member.summary: Gets or sets the step HTML attribute, which works with min and max to limit the increments at which a numeric or date-time value can be set. It can be the string any or a positive floating point number. If this is not set to any, the control accepts only values at multiples of the step value greater than the minimum.

member.name: T:AngleSharp.DOM.Html.HTMLTableElement
member.summary: Represents the HTML table element.

member.name: M:AngleSharp.DOM.Html.HTMLTableElement.InsertRowAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Inserts a new empty row in the table. The new row is inserted immediately before and in the same section as the current indexth row in the table. If index is -1 or equal to the number of rows, the new row is appended. In addition, when the table is empty the row is inserted into a TBODY which is created and inserted into the table.
member.param: The row number where to insert a new row. This index starts from 0 and is relative to the logical order (not document order) of all the rows contained inside the table.
member.returns: The inserted table row.

member.name: M:AngleSharp.DOM.Html.HTMLTableElement.RemoveRowAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes a table row.
member.param: The index of the row to be deleted. This index starts from 0 and is relative to the logical order (not document order) of all the rows contained inside the table. If the index is -1 the last row in the table is deleted.
